articles.author: Arden Dier
articles.title: He Died From a Bat Bite. It Wasn't Rabies - Newser
articles.description: Fourth human case of Australian bat lyssavirus proves fatal in New South Wales
articles.content: An Australian man has died after becoming just the fourth known person to contract an extremely rare, bat-borne virus. Australian bat lyssavirus (ABLV)—unique to Australia, where it was first identif… [+1175 chars]
